entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 1: "Jesus, The Servant"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 1: "Jesus, The Servant"
media:group.media:description:
We show God’s love when we serve others.
“Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet” (John 13:14).

entry.title: Bible story "On the Way to Calvary" | Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 2 | Gracelink

media:group.media:title: Bible story "On the Way to Calvary" | Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 2 | Gracelink
media:group.media:description:
Friends, Share with others, and Subscribe to our channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/HopeKidsOfficial We can help others carry their burdens. “Carry each other’s burdens, and in this way, you will fulfill the law of Christ” (Galatians 6:2).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 3: "The Day Jesus Died"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 3: "The Day Jesus Died"
media:group.media:description:
We serve God when we share His love with others.
“For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life” (John 3:16).

entry.title: Bible story "He’s Alive!" | Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 4 | Gracelink

media:group.media:title: Bible story "He’s Alive!" | Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 4 | Gracelink
media:group.media:description:
Friends, Share with others, and Subscribe to our channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/HopeKidsOfficial We serve God when we tell others that Jesus has risen. “He said to them, Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation”(Mark 16:15).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 5: "Do You Love Me?"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 5: "Do You Love Me?"
media:group.media:description:
We serve God when we take care of others.
“Again Jesus said,. . . ‘Do you love me?. . . Take care of my sheep’ ” (John 21:16).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 6: "Noah Builds A Boat"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 6: "Noah Builds A Boat"
media:group.media:description:
People in God’s family want to do His will.
“Teach me to do your will, for you are my God” (Psalm 143:10).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 7: The Floating Zoo

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 7: The Floating Zoo
media:group.media:description:
People in God’s family work together.
“Work together as a team for the faith” (Philippians 1:27, ICB).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 8: Waiting Patiently?

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 8: Waiting Patiently?
media:group.media:description:
People in God’s family wait patiently together for Him.
“Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up”(Galatians 6:9).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 9: "A Rainbow Promise"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 9: "A Rainbow Promise"
media:group.media:description:
God’s people rejoice because He cares for them.
“I will remember my covenant between me and you and all living creatures of every kind. Never again will the waters become a flood to destroy all life” (Genesis 9:15).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 10: "What Is It?"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 10: "What Is It?"
media:group.media:description:
We worship God when we enjoy keeping the Sabbath.
“If you call the Sabbath a delight . . .you will find your joy in the Lord” (Isaiah 58:13, 14).

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 11: "Snakebite!"
media:group.media:description:
We worship God when we have faith in Him.
“Have faith in God” (Mark 11:22).

entry.title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 12: "Words to Remember"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 12: "Words to Remember"
media:group.media:description: We worship God when we choose to obey Him. “Love the Lord your God and . . . serve him with all your heart”(Deuteronomy 11:13).

entry.title: Bible story "Balaam and the Talking Donkey" | Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 13 | Gracelink

media:group.media:title: Bible story "Balaam and the Talking Donkey" | Primary Year A Quarter 2 Episode 13 | Gracelink
media:group.media:description:
Friends, Share with others, and Subscribe to our channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/HopeKidsOfficial We worship God when we follow His instructions. “Anyone who loves me will obey my teaching.”(John 14:23).
